Author: Theblacrose28
Text: I have BED. If I would have had this gene technically I wouldn’t have eaten as much as a child. So I probably wouldn’t have been overweight. So my parents probably wouldn’t have obsessed over my weight. If they wouldn’t have done that I probably wouldn’t have binged as much for control and other reasons. So technically I actually might not have BED if I would have had that gene. Interesting

Author: stopandbelieve
Text: I am intrigued by this. Isn’t there also research on leptin levels in pts with anorexia nervosa? I don’t really have any coherent thoughts on this but thanks for sharing the article!
